methods.name: stepSize
methods.description:
Step size used to in- or decrement the conveyor position. Can also be provided
through properties on TabIndex.

methods.name: moveConveyor
methods.description:
Increment or decrement the conveyor steps within bounds.
Bounds are: [0, this.tabsExceededWidth].

methods.name: tabsExceededWidth
methods.description: Calculate the amount of by which the tabs exceed the width of the conveyor.

methods.name: conveyorArrowStyle
methods.description: Check if controls should be visible or hidden.

methods.name: controlAttributes
methods.description: Get attributes that are required for conveyor controls.

stepSize.description: Increments or decrements the conveyor position
